content: सारूप्यं {@--1@} Sameness of form, similarity, likeness, conformity, resemblance; अंतर्वृत्तिसारूप्यतः <ls>Māl. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Assimilation to the deity (one of the four states of {%Mukti%}). {@--3@} (In dramas) An angry treatment of one mistaken for another through resemblance; see <ls>S. D. 464.</ls> {@--4@} Surprise at seeing an object or its likeness seen elsewhere.
